detailsData.title: Standard of Excellence
detailsData.content: Our elite programs have been developed by lawyers, for other intense career professionals to meet the needs and exacting expectations of professional services firms and their partners. And they're implemented by a highly trained team who has been carefully chosen for their experience and expertise to deliver.

detailsData.title: Operating with Integrity
detailsData.content: You and your team will know exactly what to expect from our programs — the why, what and how. The transparency in our business and the commitment shown by our coach facilitators ensures your partners feel understood, supported and empowered.

detailsData.title: People First Approach
detailsData.content: Relationships are at the heart of everything we do. They're the reason the world's leading law and professional services firms continue to trust us with their people, and the reason their partners feel comfortable and confident taking this important journey with us.

detailsData.title: Customized Talent Solutions
detailsData.content: We offer customized workshops ranging from one to three hours that help to educate and empower your professionals and leaders about how to approach succession planning and prepare for life after retirement from an intense career. Over time, these workshops help to normalize the topics of retirement and succession planning, allowing for more proactive and effective engagement on these topics.

address: 7400 North Oracle Road Suite 150-201 Tucson, AZ 85704
subHeading: The succession planning partnership for retirement success
valueProp: Succession planning is a critical element of a firm’s talent management strategy and more importantly, the key to ensuring the wellbeing of your team as they prepare for retirement. Zelinka Parsons is the experienced partner you need to help plan a successful path forward — for everyone.

testimonalData.text: I absolutely and enthusiastically recommend that every partner considering participating do so. I am so happy that I did.
testimonalData.author: Cary H.

testimonalData.text: Zelinka Parsons is a wonderful resource for committed professionals who need to find additional meaning in their lives.
testimonalData.author: John B., Partner, AmLaw 10 Firm

testimonalData.text: I have executed on the game plan we devised together and am thoroughly enjoying my retirement.
testimonalData.author: Partner, AmLaw 10 Firm
